name: Mummy Cat
description:
My submission for MoonMoon's second annual game jam. Inspired by Mischief Makers, Kirby, and countless games from the NES and SNES, you take on the role of a stretchy-armed mummy cat girl (who is apparently MoonMoon's wife) to smash and climb your way through a dusty crypt. 2 stages and Boss stand between you and MoonMoon's cat, Eddie.

Controls:

Keyboard: Arrow Keys to move, Z to Jump, X to grab and throw, F4 toggles fullscreen and windowed.

Xbox Controller: Control Stick or Dpad to move, A to Jump, B to grab.
